settings.label: Image Slider
settings.info: This setting defines whether the image slider will be displayed on both desktop and mobile devices, or only on mobile devices.

settings.label: Enable Tab
settings.info: Enable this setting to move the product description into a collapsing tab.

settings.label: Start Open
settings.info: Enable this setting to have the description tab open by default.

settings.label: New Time
settings.info: Number of days a product stays 'new' for.

settings.label: Share Image
settings.info: This image will appear as the thumbnail when a non-product/non-article page is shared on social media (size: 1200x1200).

settings.label: Shop Short Description
settings.info: This will appear next to the shop name on the homepage browser tab.

settings.label: Shop Long Description
settings.info: This will appear on search results that return the homepage, should contain common keywords and be limited to 150 - 160 characters.
